A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it! As a super-fan of the series\, I love where the story is going. It makes old characters seem more human\, breaks new boundaries in regards to potential\, and shatters former definitions and barriers of what the Force is and how it holds the Universe together. The references to Eastern philosophy are refreshing and the parallels that are drawn to the originals will have you watching this one over and over! May go see it a 5th time. In my opinion one of the most visually stunning films I’ve ever seen.
